long_description: The Buck Alpha CrossLock Knife offers precise control in wet, slippery conditions. The spear-point blade and saw with integrated gut hook create an effective, multifunction outdoor knife. 420HC stainless-steel blade and saw. Sturdy lock mechanism for added durability. Anodized aluminum handle is knurled for effective grip. The Buck Alpha CrossLock Knife comes with a heavy-duty nylon sheath.
short_description: The Buck Alpha CrossLock Knife offers precise control in wet, slippery conditions. The spear-point blade and saw with integrated gut hook create an effective, multifunction outdoor knife.
